metadata.title: CVE-2018-10199 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In versions of mruby up to and including 1.4.0, a use-after-free vulnerability exists in src/io.c::File#initilialize_copy(). An attacker that can cause Ruby code to be run can possibly use this to execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: mruby package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
